about_the_game:
Save Nature. Save Humanity. Save Yourself.

Build your Raiding Party

Discover and hire a wide variety of followers along your journey. Party members gain experience from combat and level up, with certain followers evolving into a veteran form at max level. Losing party members in combat may result in the player gaining new positive and negative traits.

Customize your Character

Complete missions and kill enemies to gain experience and level up your character. New attribute and discipline points are awarded as you gain levels. Spend attribute points on the Power, Speed, Resilience, and Awareness player attributes to improve your character statistics and combat performance. Each attribute is tailored towards a specific play style. For example, Power is geared towards melee combat builds, while Awareness is more beneficial for ranged combat builds.

Spend discipline points on the four discipline skill trees: Melee, Ranged, Physical, and Magic, to learn new and enhance existing abilities.

Utilize Vehicle Fire Support

Equip your Longship, Airship, and Spaceship with a wide variety of weapon systems, and utilize your vehicle to provide fire support for your party in unique, mobile tower defense gameplay.

Explore the World Map

Explore the world of Severance, a post-apocalyptic, war-torn hellscape reduced to a smoldering shadow of planet earth’s former glory. Shaped by the cataclysmic effects of a sixth mass extinction event, nature has completely disappeared and humanity is on the brink of total collapse.

Collect new Weapons, Gear, and Items

As you explore mission environments and kill enemies, you will collect over 100+ weapons, gear, and items to aid you on your journey.

Battle the Forces of Darkness

Confront the nightmarish evils that haunt the dark corners of the world of Severance.

content_descriptors.notes: RAIDING PARTY contains mild violence with blood appearing when agents are damaged. There is an instance of decapitation in the first main quest mission, and instances of crucifixion in the fourth main quest mission. Main quest missions are indicated with gold icons on the world map. This game also contains references to drug and alcohol use and trafficking by criminal organizations, but not in a favorable manner.

short_description: RAIDING PARTY is a retro action roguelite with horror gameplay elements. You play as the Wastelander, a retired agent who is ordered to retrieve an ancient AI device. Recruit, train, and lead a raiding party of elite warriors against an evil empire as you discover the AI can help save humanity.
